hero.headline: Smart Design.
hero.subtext: IMPAKT Studio focuses on real value. The 'K' in IMPAKT stands for Key Impact – the vital and practical effects that design brings to your brand.

about.headline: We build real value, not illusions.
about.origin_question: Why do many beautiful websites fail to drive results?
about.origin_desc: At IMPAKT, we believe a beautiful website is a necessity, but brand insight is the key. We were born to bridge the gap between 'eye-catching interfaces' and 'real-world performance'.
about.p1: A website is your brand's digital face. A beautiful face must go hand-in-hand with an intelligent brain to truly deliver value.
about.p2: We work with sincerity: honest quotes, real progress, and concrete results. Here, transparency isn't just a promise; it's our core principle.
about.legal_desc: Every agreement at IMPAKT is formalized through clear contracts or written agreements. We commit to protecting client interests through transparency in costs, timelines, and the quality of the delivered source code.
about.diff_1_desc: We don't create meaningless visuals. Every touchpoint on the website is designed based on a deep understanding of brand identity and user behavior. Each project is a unique signature, never a copy.
about.diff_2_title: Tech Mastery, Optimized from the Core
about.diff_2_desc: Completely eliminating bulky pre-built templates. Our systems are built from native source code to ensure peak loading speeds, top-tier security, and readiness for any future scalability.
about.transparencyText: Clear quotes from the start with no hidden fees. Solutions tailored to your needs without bloated, unnecessary features.
about.performanceText: We don't leave after delivery. IMPAKT commits to technical support and sustainable operational consulting throughout your business journey.
about.p3: Whether you are an individual building a portfolio or a business expanding your market, IMPAKT is not just a design agency — we are your lifelong partner in growth.

projects.headline: Featured Projects
projects.subheadline: Explore our frontend demos, meticulously built for UI/UX excellence and performance.
projects.p1_desc: A modern retail website focused on optimizing user experience and shopping behavior.
projects.p2_desc: An intuitive data management system designed for fast and accurate decision-making.
projects.p3_desc: Minimalist design highlighting imagery, typography, and brand personality.
projects.desc: Explore our collection of UI/UX standard interfaces. Experience real-time responsiveness on Desktop and Mobile right here.

services.headline: Crafting Unique Digital Experiences.
services.subline: We provide end-to-end website design and development — from strategy and interface to operations — to create sustainable business value.

web.title: Full-Service Website Design & Development
web.desc: We handle the entire process: brand analysis, bespoke interface design, and development optimized for performance, SEO, and scalability.

process.headline: How we turn ideas into effective products
process.subline: Transparent – Strategic – Always alongside our clients

steps.title: Discovery & Brand Insight
steps.desc: Listening to business goals, analyzing target audiences, and brand positioning to build a strategic foundation.

steps.title: Strategy & Wireframing
steps.desc: Building website structure, user experience flows, and content direction based on analyzed insights.

steps.title: Design & Development
steps.desc: Crafting a unique interface following brand DNA and proceeding with performance-optimized development.

steps.title: Testing & Optimization
steps.desc: Cross-device testing, speed optimization, SEO, and UX refinement before launch.

steps.title: Handover & Partnership
steps.desc: User manuals, technical maintenance, and long-term development support for your business.

why.title: Why Choose IMPAKT?
why.subheadline: We don't create soulless websites. We create business tools.
why.p1_desc: Custom-designed according to brand identity. We say no to generic layouts and copied templates.
why.p2_desc: We only implement features that truly add value, keeping the website lean and goal-oriented.
why.p3_desc: Built for your current needs with clear costs, and easily scalable as your brand grows.
